item.description:
Join other BA members for an evening of activism. We'll be writing letters to the editor on the topic of religiously-motivated medical neglect, in advance of our protest at the Christian Science Mother Church on June 8th (for more information, check out the news page on the BA website.

We'll provide a delicious casserole meal; a donation of 2-3 dollars each will be sufficient to cover our costs. Those coming are welcome to bring additional beverages or snacks. Bring your laptops and your rhetorical acumen -- things are going to get epistolary.
item.name: Letter-writing party
